channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects -FW6 Potholes problem, 14th May
item.description:

Report on FixMyStreet

Outside 74a

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Priors Road, Whaddon, Cheltenham

item.category: Tree causing damage/obstruction to pavement or road

item.title: Unable to see approaching traffic, 14th May
item.description:
Poor road design with chicanes too far apart on a corner with additional issue of cow parsley etc blocking the view of approaching traffic.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cleeve Road, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Over grown bushes and vegetation and weeds resulting in the pavement uneven and blocking the path, 13th May
item.description:
All around the bottom end of.unwin Road and along butts walk. Looks uncared for and unkempt.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: The grass is too high and blocking the view of traffic travelling on the main highway., 13th May
item.description:
The main junction where Withybridge lane meets Tewkesbury road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury Road, Tewkesbury

item.title: Beautiful sunshine for days but water still coming up through drain, 13th May
item.description:
From Whitlands Road/Way, towards Endsleigh. Drain is BEFORE what was the Endsleigh offices. Water is escaping the drain, as in coming up through the drain. The weather has been stunning for a few days so it isn't the case of excess water. Also, it's been leaking/expelling water for a few weeks. I kept forgetting to report.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
